review.comment: I was so impressed by all the support received when I took a job teaching in China. I felt really prepared which helped ease any nerves. I truly feel they care about their teachers and want us to feel confident and comfortable. I also made lifelong friends I met who were also going to teach in China with Impact Teachers. I couldn’t recommend this agency enough! Definitely 5✨
review.review_reply: Thank you Nicola for your kind words.  We are always here for you.

review.comment: I have had a great experience with them. Their expertise was helpful in finding positions that worked well for me.

I have worked with another company and heard through a colleague at my school that Impact Teachers was really great. They really looked after them when they made the move to the UK and highly recommended I join them. They offer really good transition packages and help you every the step of the way from start to finish. High recommend them.

We've worked with Impact Teachers, Mary in particular for the last 5 years. The level of service from both her and the company as a whole has been exemplary.

To support this the candidates we receive are of an exceptionally high standard.

Impact Teachers crew are fun to work with, and they really listen to what you're looking for. I got a great Primary job that I'm planning to stay in until my visa is up. Would be great if their social events were more frequent, but the ones I could make it to were a good time!
Very helpful people.
Nice
Impact Teachers are amazing to work for, I thoroughly enjoyed my time there. Ashley Yee in particular was a dedicated and professional colleague.
Impact teachers are responsive and they have good range of candidates! I recommend using them!

Impact Teachers is a fantastic teaching agency to be a part of! I have been with Impact for 3 years now and from the very beginning, my consultant Alex was incredibly helpful in getting me set up to work and live in the UK. The team is always willing to help with any questions, concerns or requests you may have, and they really go above and beyond to make sure that you are getting the best possible treatment while you are teaching over here. I recently messaged Alice at Impact with a query, and she was able to quickly provide me with the best solution. I couldn't recommend them enough!
Super helpful when I came over from NZ, friendly bunch of peeps

Impact really made it easy for me to teach in the UK. They provided support every step of the way and made sure I was comfortable all the way through.

They have gave solid advice on things like Visas, renting and even guide you through the interview process with various schools.

In addition the Time sheets were easy and timely with fast payment.

Very solid agency and I would recommend them to any teacher looking to teach overseas.

Have worked as a teacher as part of Impact for several years now and they are fantastic. Have found me some lovely schools to work in and are very attentive to the type of work I wish to do in the education sphere.

Through Impact I have worked in many different education levels, from Primary, Secondary to SEN and they have always tried their hardest to find me institutions that suit what I am looking for. Their office team is always on hand and helpful.

The variety and flexibility of work I have experienced in my time with Impact means I fully recommend them as a leading Teaching agency to anyone looking for work in eduction in London.

Impact Teachers is an amazing agency to work with. They listen to you and also deliver what you want. I would like to give special thanks to Frida, Jolanta and Joanna they have been really great in helping me finding a long term job as I looking for one since a very long time.
Such an amazing experience at Impact Teachers! They sorted out my documents quickly and I was teaching soon after. They really listen to what you want. Special thanks to Frida, Mary and Basil!
Great office, great agency. I have worked for them for a year and a half and I have had the chance to go to India for a project with them. It was a great experience.

Impact Teachers  is a great agency, second to none. Their workers endeavour and try their hardest to get you in and working, especially Frida/Alice, the two people that went that extra mile to get me work at Impact Teacher. I was luckily referred by a friend to Frida, and I am grateful to have met such a professional and hard working person dedicated to getting me work. Her colleague  Alice was particularly quick at clearing my files and is really appreciated.  I can honestly say their work seems as if they work without sleeping, the SEND team  (specifically Merle and Jolanta) also work tirelessly to get you work daily.
.  A** company, would definitely recommend to teaching assistants !
Professional and hard working recruiters, I recommend them to any new teachers looking for a job in London.

I could have never moved to the UK without Mary and Ashley from Impact. Ashley met me in Canada and helped me through every single step of the process of moving over and getting a job lined up. Mary helped me through two years teaching abroad and was always someone I called to talk to about any issues I had or questions or just to chat about how my day went. Impact doesn't feel like a distant employer, they feel like family. They take such good care of everyone that works for impact. I could never recommend any other agency. Impact teachers is THE best teaching agency in the UK hands down!!

Through impact I have twice been to India as part of their outreach programme. The organisation, attitude and approach ensured a brilliant time. Ashley and Drabz were amazing and ensured everything ran smoothly. The work they do with the teachers has a huge impact and improved me as a teacher. A truly fantastic experience and would work again with impact in a heartbeat
Went on a trip abroad with Impact. It was superbly organised, the team were great fun and the work the organisation does truely impacted the teachers we visited.

I loved working with Impact. When I first arrived I was with another company and they were good but impact seemed more personal and I felt that they were actually looking out for me not just sending me to any old school. I eventually got a long term contract with a school they found for me and I've been teaching here ever since. The staff are great I met them at the social nights they run and had some great chats with Sarah, Brandy and Ashley who really continued to be great helps to my career!

Ashley was incredibly helpful whilst I was overseas travelling for an ENTIRE YEAR! She accommodated and understood the challenges of seeking employment in the UK whilst I was in other countries through Skype interviews and introducing me to colleagues.

I worked as a teacher through Impact for 2 1/2 years and I thought they were very good! They recommended  to me by friends from teachers college and were very helpful. Ashley was my consultant while I was still in Ontario and she provided excellent communication and help in spite of the time difference. She made everything very clear, lined up Skype interviews, and negotiated a fair wage. I met her in person once I moved to London and she conducted a great orientation as well!

Once I started working, Nathan was my consultant and he was also very helpful. The only issues I had were with my school forgetting to confirm my timesheets (which isn't Impact's fault). Nathan always made sure to contact the school and remind them so confirm so that I would be paid.

All in all, if you are interested in teaching abroad, I think Impact is one of the good agencies to work through!

They are best agency I have ever worked for.  I'm a NQT. I finished my degree last summer and I registered with three agencies in London. Two of them only gave work as a TA - they said I needed more experience before I could work as a teacher. However most of the time they sent me to SEN schools, which were lovely but would not help me to earn more experience as a mainstream primary school teacher.

Then I registered with Impact. The process took about two weeks while they checked my references. Once they that, they sent me to work as a teacher straight away.

I did daily supply and short-term supply for about two months. Afterwards, I told the agency I felt ready for a long-time assignment. The next week they sent me a contract for three weeks; by the end of the third week, the school was so happy with me that they asked me to stay with them until the summer.

Even though next year I hope to be hired directly by a school so I can do my induction year, singing in with Impact Teachers in one of the best decisions I have ever made. They have helped a lot. Every time I had a doubt or I was lacking confidence, I would call them and they would explain anything to me very kindly. Unlike other agencies, I feel they are honestly invested on making your life easier.

I’m very thankful for everything they have done for me, and I could not recommend them more.

Please AVOID Impact along with virtually all teaching agencies. The UK is absolutely desperate for teachers in the state school (non private) system, trust me, apply directly to schools. This agency spent a whole year taking a truly absurd cut of my paycheque (how much, of course, I'll never know - they go to great lengths to hide what you would be making if you actually worked for the school instead of "through" them). Like most teaching agencies, they do very VERY little - enough to justify taking a cut in the first month of your pay, maybe. Instead, they collect thousands of dollars all year long. I made less than my colleagues all year, and please be aware that Impact will not ("cannot") actually pay you either. Oh no. They make you register with a PAYROLL COMPANY! These firms should be utterly illegal and probably will be soon. It's yet another third party profiting off your hard work. Basically, you work all day (often in an appalling school, because the state of education in the UK is generally shocking - especially in terms of behaviour). You earn in the region of $200. Impact takes a huge cut. The payroll company takes a moderate cut (for NOTHING - they are simply giving you what you earned! lol). Taxes come off. Additional taxes from your home country might come off too (don't forget that part). A forced pension that you can't possibly get back (unless maybe you live in the UK when you retire, decades from now) comes off too, thanks to the payroll company's insistence. At the end of the day, beaten and broken by the UK's education system, you take home what's left - i.e., in the region of half. HALF of what you deserve/would earn if you were actually employed by the school. Please please please I beg you, do not make my mistake. Get hired by schools directly. Research and apply to schools directly. Don't go through agencies. Ever. They never help you enough to be worth what they take ALL YEAR off your pay. I'm currently fighting tooth and nail to get the bonus I was promised for sticking out this terrible year, and I can't even find one person at Impact I dealt with in the past. The turnover at this organisation is that high. No one responded to my emails, no one contacted me, nothing. It's all for me to figure out and fight for. If I ever get that measly bonus (£250 for lasting a whole year), I may consider changing this review. But really, everything in it is entirely honest so I don't see why I should. I want to see others forewarned... p.s. as with most companies these days, they definitely have no problem posting fake reviews so please don't see any of these positive ones as reliable. Ask yourself: why would someone lie about the negative aspects? Answer: no reason at all. Just advice from an experienced teacher for those vulnerable souls that companies like Impact seek out and prey on. p.p.s. a tip for companies writing fake reviews: don't overuse the same phrases, it's a dead giveaway ("extremely helpful" comes up for Impact a few too many times to seem legit).

Extremely professional and helpful. I have a job starting for the new School year in September and I have all the confidence that it will go well. The process up until now has been extremely easy and stress free. Thanks Impact Teachers for all your help. Look forward to work the next year.

Friendly and most understanding agency I've ever dealt with. They actually wanted to help me and were very accommodating to my needs. They lined up several interviews for me which meant I was able to select the school that best suited me. I've been very happy with the service and have thoroughly been enjoying the current school i'm at. Thank-you to all the staff at Impact for helping out.

Impact Teachers were very friendly and easy to deal with. They actually listened to what I wanted and helped me with tips on where to live in London and what to do regarding flat share and budgeting. Excellent agency to work with you won't be let down!

They were very helpful and understanding. They explained everything to me about obtaining a visa and provided many tips of what to do when I first arrive in London. I met with Impact when I first landed and they were so accommodating and friendly. They found me a permanent role in a Primary School that turned out to be very close to where I live now. It all worked out well and I couldn’t thank Impact Teachers enough!
Impact Teachers have been a great agency and were extremely accommodating to my requirements and needs for finding me the right role.

I signed up to Impact Teachers 6 months ago whilst still living in Australia. They explained the visa process thoroughly and helped me with all the questions I had about moving to the UK.  Prior to moving I did a few Skype interviews with schools that Impact set up and one of the schools wanted me as a year 3 Teacher. It was great to have a job lined up and to deal with an agency who actually listened and followed through with what they promised. Thank you so much Impact!
Extremely helpful and friendly. They were able to find me a PE permanent role in a school I thoroughly enjoy teaching at. You will not be let down if you sign up to Impact teachers!

Impact has been honest and understanding since I registered. I was really worried about making the initial move from Ontario to the UK. They helped me along the whole way and always kept great communication. I had plenty of questions and they always did their best to ensure I was at ease and my questions were answered. Great agency you won't regret it!

Great Agency. They were extremely helpful in finding me work. I am a supply teacher and have been very pleased with every school they have sent me to. They also met my expectations of pay. Couldn't recommend them enough!

I signed up with Impact teachers around a month ago after being unsuccessful with other agencies in London. I'm a qualified Primary Teacher however I continued to be sent to schools that weren't right for me or not what I was looking for. Impact actually listened to what I was looking for and genuinely cared about placing me somewhere I would be happy in. I'm now in a Primary school close to home and love going to work! I could not recommend Impact Teachers enough they will find you what you want!
Have done supply and long term roles with Impact Teachers. Very happy with their help and support. Highly recommend.

Told me travelling 2 hours on a last minute booking was a reasonable expectation and that I should be grateful for the work. It would have been faster for me to go to Cambridge than the other side of London. There are much better agencies. Only use for long term work.
Love working here!!
Really helpful and supportive. Fantastic agency
awesome agency!!!
So helpful and accommodating to my needs as a new teacher to the UK. Highly recommend you will not be let down!
Wonderfully friendly staff who dealt with me, professional and have kept good communication since my visit.

Working with Impact was a great experience, coming from another country they were able to find me a job right away which made the transition a smooth one. Also, the staff are all very friendly and happy to help with anything I needed. Thank-you all so much

I registered with Impact Teachers in Canada when I was looking for a long-term placement in the UK. The agency was professional and proactive right from the start. Unlike some other agencies I have dealt with, Impact delivered what it promised. They were incredibly helpful with the registration process, kept me up-to-date with employment possibilities and arranged an interview with a school that met my needs. After I arrived in the UK, they maintained an outstanding support system and frequently contacted me via phone or email to ensure my transition into the British education system was going smoothly. The staff of the agency are very passionate and personable. They look out for their teachers and are quick to offer support and assistance when needed. Whenever I contacted them about anything, they were quick to respond and always had the answers I was looking for. In addition to this, I experienced no problems when it came to payment or any other administrative matters. If you are looking for a truly great teaching agency in the UK, you need look no further than Impact Teachers.
